ISSUE.TITLE: The JaxB binding file of flowable-cxf must be updated to use Jakarta EE 9/10
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** The JaxB binding file introduced with ACT-4012 was not updated when moving to Jakarta EE 9/10 **Expected behavior** This file must be updated to declare the right JaxB version and the right namespaces provided by Jakarta EE 9/10 **Additional context** Flowable 7.0.0

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Prepare version 7.0.0-PETALS-X dedicated to Petals ESB

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3755 - The JaxB binding file of flowable-cxf must be updated to use Jakarta EE 9/10
